mapper.insert: insert into member(member_id, member_pw, member_name, member_phone, member_email, member_create_dt, member_link, report_count, member_status) value(#{member_id},#{member_pw},#{member_name},#{member_phone},#{member_email},now(),"N", 0, 1)
mapper.select: select * from member where member_id=#{member_id} and member_pw=#{member_pw}
